Comments_List: Gained a better understanding of cybersecurity challenges from a policy perspective.

Does a good job at providing exposure to a wide variety of issues and introducing the subject to students from non-technical backgrounds. Professor Wittenstein also invited students to a number of related events and conferences throughout the semester. I felt these added significantly to my understanding of these issues and complemented the course very well.
Yes. For students interested in international security issues this subject will be increasingly important.
